title: Mechanic / Mechatronics Engineer / Electrician (m/f/d)
description: People already know us in China, India and the USA. It's time for you to get to know us too. A family-run innovation company that supplies customers in the most economically powerful countries in the world from Karlsruhe. Yes, that really exists: at OPTIMAGS! Using innovative, solution-oriented and sometimes, literally, unique processes, we develop and manufacture ultra-precise coating machines for the pharmaceutical industry and beyond. What at first glance looks like a typical industrial company is, upon closer inspection, much more than that: because we accompany our customer projects from the idea through the first pilot tests to the finished machines. Because of this, we can look back on numerous patents and awards, including the Innovators Award. Quality Made in Germany. Tasks Made in Germany. Made by YOU!Your tasks:Working in a familiar, revolutionary company is most likely different from what you have previously experienced in corporations or on construction sites. But don't worry: when it comes to activities, you don't have to reinvent the wheel as long as the following tasks are not foreign to you: Commissioning our program-controlled laboratory and production machines Carrying out signal, functional and process tests on the assembly and the entire system Troubleshooting, error analysis and so on You will then also suggest suitable solutions to us. As a sparring partner, you will instruct and train both the team and our customers in the handling and handling of our laboratory and production machines. Acceptance of the systems as part of FATs (Factory Acceptance Tests) and SATs (Site Acceptance tests) in collaboration with the customer Remote support of the customer afterwards You help with questions or problemsQualificationYou rightly expect a lot from an employer.Do you also meet our expectations?We don't expect you to be able to do magic. But in addition to certain basic requirements such as reliability, independence and the ability to work in a team, you should have: Completed technical training in the field of plant mechanic, mechatronics engineer, industrial electrician or university degree Good PLC and visualization knowledge required: Siemens S7 and Beckhoff Very good knowledge of using MS Teams, TeamViewer or others Remote platforms Very good knowledge of English and intercultural understanding desirable Willingness to travel for 1-2 trips abroad per year (duration: maximum 2 weeks/stay) Ability to work in a team and enjoy solving, tinkering and screwing technical issuesBenefitsYour commitment our appreciation.Fair deal, right?We combine all the positive characteristics of family-run companies and large industrial groups, but offer our team an appreciative environment in which they feel comfortable. Here you are more than just one number among many. We rely on you and will always treat you with respect and on an equal footing. You can also look forward to: 4.5 day week / 30 days vacation No shift work / no overtime Flexible working hours Very good work-life balance Attractive remuneration Company pension scheme Food and fuel vouchers Kindergarten subsidy Free parking spaces Company vehicle pool Modernly equipped workplacesYour way to us.You had Now you have the opportunity to get a first impression of us. Now we would like to get to know you. Simply fill out our application form. It only takes a few minutes, but it can change your entire life. We look forward to seeing you!Find Jobs in Germany on Arbeitnow

title: Videographer / Photographer (m/w/d)
description: In the right place at the right time. This could apply to you at this moment. Because this is not a standard job advertisement. This is the opportunity you have been waiting for for a long time. You have the opportunity to become part of TaxIt Consulting GmbH. A company with an award for innovation and sustainability and on a growth path in the heart of Stuttgart. We are one of Germany's leading service providers in the areas of personnel marketing and employer branding. Our customers include the largest law firms in Germany and companies from a wide variety of industries. Our team of almost 25 people couldn't be more diverse. From a former management consultant at Ernst & Young, to a TikTok influencer or a studied videographer, we have experts in a wide variety of areas who all have one thing in common: the desire to go the extra mile and deliver outstanding results for our customers. If you feel like it, in a dynamic and equally established companies on a growth path and want to become part of a young, ambitious team, then you have come to the right place. Tasks What your part will be in our team. There is no such thing as a typical working day with us. We are constantly developing as a company and expect the same from you. We offer you a wide range of tasks. These are, for example:You are responsible for high-quality photo and video equipmentYou regularly travel to our customers and carry out photo shoots in direct customer contactYou are part of the production team on siteYou are involved in pre-production and storytellingYou are responsible for production and post-productionYou take direct responsibility with your own ProjectsQualificationsWhat we want from you.An impeccable CV, top grades and a degree in your pocket? That's good and we honor it, but it doesn't have to be that way. We are primarily interested in you as a person and always check individually whether your expectations, your skills and your drive suit us. You should definitely have qualities such as working independently, a sense of responsibility and an openness to new things. In addition, the position has the following requirement profile: You are a videographer, photographer, media technician, AV technician, come from the event industry, from TV or have had one You have already successfully run a YouTube channelYou have a great passion for videography and image creation and have an eye for detailYou like to try out new, creative things and bring your own style to visual creationYou have advanced knowledge of Premiere Pro, Lightroom and PhotoshopYou bring ingenuity (fresh ideas)Hands-on mentality, flexibility, reliability, teamwork and motivation are part of your personalityBenefitsWhy we are not a normal employer.Yes, we demand a lot from our team members, but we also have a lot to offer in return.
